Text: Restructuring Today Tuesday June pst Were happy to provide you with the Tuesday June th issue of Restructuring Today You wont want to miss Restructuring Todays coverage of Eyeforenergys Energy Management conference Please see the issue attached Todays Headlines Giant paper firm snubs outsourcing Sempra says do it Calif politicians got it wrong GAO confirms Freeman denies LADWP ricocheted NARUC chief worries markets got bad rap The eyes of the US are upon Texas Lovable agency defends competition Dynegy plan keeps utility telecom is toast Those crazy gas prices move again Siemens says tough times will continue Williams chops back traders CORRECTION Your free trial ends tomorrow If youd like to subscribe be sure to take advantage of the special Eyeforenergy discount The offer expires Thursday Fax the order form on the last page of todays issue attached or call Season Hawksley at Thank you Do not hit reply To remove or change your email address write to
